description: TNF interacts with TNFR1, initiating distinct and overlapping signal transduction pathways.
TNF interacts with TNFR2, which initiates different signal transduction pathways.
Agents that block the action of TNF are used to treat rheumatoid arthritis.
Agents that block the action of TNF are used to treat ankylosing spondylitis.
Agents that block the action of TNF are used to treat inflammatory bowel disease.
Agents that block the action of TNF are used to treat psoriasis.
